pullRequest.title: Badge fixes in README and PR Template
pullRequest.bodyText:
Update twister2 badge to reference ci-beam.apache.org rather than builds.apache.org
Add link to history for GitHub Actions workflows
Remove "Build Status" badge which just points to PostCommit_Java, already represented in the matrix.

Post-Commit Tests Status (on master branch)

See .test-infra/jenkins/README for trigger phrase, status and link of all Jenkins jobs.
GitHub Actions Tests Status (on master branch)



See CI.md for more information about GitHub Actions CI.

commit.message: Add links to history for GH Actions Workflows
Remove Java PostCommit build status, it's duplicated in the matrix

nodes.bodyText: This has gotten really messy. We could easily script this.
